name: Complex Gaming
description: A top-ranked network with a wide variety of game modes, especially known for its large Pixelmon server.

name: OPBlocks Network
description: A high-quality server network featuring unique Prison, Skyblock, and Pixelmon content.

name: Hypixel Network
description: One of the largest and most famous Minecraft servers, offering a massive selection of original minigames.

name: WildWood SMP
description: A new SMP-based server focused on Lifesteal and Survival gameplay with a growing community.

name: ManaCube
description: An established server with unique game modes like a Greek mythology RPG and over 2500 parkour maps.

name: BlossomCraft
description: A laid-back, community-focused SMP server with an economy, no griefing, and a supportive staff.

name: PikaNetwork
description: A rapidly growing server network that offers a range of popular competitive and survival game modes.

name: ExtremeCraft
description: An established network offering a variety of thrilling game modes and a strong, long-standing community.

name: Netherite
description: A unique network focused on Lifesteal, Survival, and Skyblock, striving to deliver an enjoyable gaming experience.

name: Advancius Network
description: A server known for its large number of free ranks and over 20 unique, non-pay-to-win game modes.
